item.description:
Annie Hall 1977PG
93 minutes
Winner of four Oscars -- including Best Picture and Best Actress -- director Woody Allen's iconic romantic comedy charts the relationship between neurotic writer Alvy Singer and quirky aspiring singer Annie Hall.

Cast:Woody Allen, Diane Keaton, Tony Roberts, Carol Kane, Paul Simon, Colleen Dewhurst, Janet Margolin, Shelley Duvall, Christopher Walken, Donald Symington, Mordecai Lawner, Joan Newman, Helen Ludlam, Jeff Goldblum, Sigourney WeaverDirector:Woody AllenGenres:Comedy, Romantic Comedies, Classic Comedies, ScrewballThis movie is:Cerebral, Quirky, Romantic, Witty


ENNEAGRAM AT THE MOVIES
Vegetarian dinner provided from 7 to 8pm. Fine to show up anytime. It's helpful for me to know in advance if you are coming, particularly if you are eating, though if fine just to show up if you can't decide beforehand. You are welcome to bring additional items if you want. Movie starts at 8pm and generally ends approximately at 10:30pm. We stop the movie on occasion to talk about Enneagram types, subtypes and relationship dynamics.

The cost is $20-25 sliding scale. Please feel free to bring friends and I can help them learn the types if they don't know the Enneagram.
 
Herb Pearce is an Enneagram expert, having taught over 2000 Enneagram personality types workshops, as well as the Myers-Briggs and Astrology. He is an author of 2 books, a psychotherapist for individuals, couples and families and leads Personality Types Trainings for groups, organizations, churches, schools, colleges and yoga centers.herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Enneagram at the Movies & Dinner - Annie Hall
